content: swirly mcwhirly is worked in the normal overlay mosaic row-by-row technique this free pattern can be used in any project you fancy you can make a blanket scarf shawl cushion cover or anything you can think of the pdf has one easy-to-read chart and corresponding written instructions two pdfs are available - one using us terms and one using uk terms please do share your creations online and tag #getyerhookon and #swirlymcwhirly happy crocheting abi
